title: Terra & Co. | Sustainable, Non-Toxic Oral Care inspired by Ayurveda
description: Premium oral care products made with eco-friendly ingredients. We're bridging holistic health and modern dentistry, and packaging it with Mother Earth in mind!
cleaned_text:
This variant is currently sold out. This option is currently unavailable. $48.50 $54.00 {"id":7085467336774,"title":"Charcoal Oil Pulling + Hydroxyapatite Toothpaste Bundle- PRESALE Ships Sep 15th-20th","handle":"charcoal-oil-pulling-natural-charcoal-toothpaste-with-hydroxyapatite","description":"

Better together.

We've paired our newly formulated natural charcoal hydroxyapatite toothpaste with our best-selling activated charcoal oil pulling!

Double the teeth whitening and detoxify your oral (and gut) microbiome while supporting tooth remineralization. Brush with science-backed ingredients including mineral Hydroxyapatite to protect teeth and boost your good bacteria while you swish with our cult-fav charcoal oil pulling.

Bundle and SAVE with our Brilliant Black Oral Care Bundle!

Notice the many benefits from these key ingredients:

  • Hydroxyapatite: Naturally occurring functionalized super-hero mineral for maximum strength and prevention of micro-cavities. This great non-toxic makes up and 60% of your bones. Why is this so important? As your teeth recognize this natural component, it's easier for them to intake hydroxyapatite and remineralize lost minerals while filling microscopic 'holes' prior to bacteria invading them.
  • Xylitol (from birch): A natural sweetener that starve cavity-causing bacteria that promote & Spearmint: A breath-freshening trifecta! curb the growth of tooth decay and deterioration of oral health.
  • Charcoal: A pharmaceutical-grade detoxifying ingredient to lift stains naturally from coffee, wine, and berries. An active cleanser that works like a magnet, binding with plaque, tartar, and oral toxins. Clinically tested and safe to whiten teeth twice a day everyday.
  • MCT Oil: contains more fatty acids than plain coconut oil which makes it highly absorbable, trapping harmful bacteria and reducing plaque formation. Unlike solid coconut oil, MCT oil always stays in a liquid form making it easier to swish around the mouth.
  • Coconut Oil: our mouths are constantly exposed to acidic foods and beverages. A regular re-balance is a great way to support oral health. Coconut oil's alkaline pH values of 7 to 8, make it a great aid to hydrate, nourish, and never strip an acidic mouth. It's also rich in lauric acid, a to against cavity-causing bacteria.

How to Use

Brush your teeth and scrape your tongue using a tongue scraper as part of your usual morning routine. Remove the stopper and take approx. 1 tsp of oil. Swish and pull the oil through your teeth for 2-5 mins (the longer the better!).

Discard oil into the trash. Do not swallow. Rinse optional. With the appropriately sized sip, our oil will last up to 4-6 weeks. Don't forget to floss and upgrade your toothbrush every three months.

Made in small batches, Terra & Co.'s oils are always shipped fresh and have a shelf life of 24 months from the fill date listed on the bottom of the bottle.

Pro Tip: No need to shake the bottle prior to your sip!

Oil Pulling should serve as an addition to your oral care routine and should not replace daily brushing and flossing.


Features

6.75 oz oil pulling + 3.4 oz. TSA-approved non-toxic

Free from fluoride, SLS, triclosan, byproduct of the sugar industry and can be recycled and made into new tubes. Once enjoyed simply cut off the end, rinse well, and discard it into your designated recycling bin.

In our pursuit of being completely plastic-free, not all of our Oil Pulling packaging components make the cut. We're simply not there, yet. Please toss the plastic stopper and cap into your designated recycling bin. Our endlessly recyclable ultraviolet glass bottle not only works to preserve freshness but protects it from all UV/UVB rays. Once enjoyed, rinse thoroughly and discard into your designated recycling bin.


Full Ingredients
